title: Jeff Brazier wearing wedding ring again amid marriage problems
text:
Jeff’s ring is back on (Picture: Twitter/Instagram)

Jeff Brazier has put his wedding ring back on after a video shared on social media revealed that he had removed the accessory.

Jeff wed long-term girlfriend Kate Dwyer in September 2018.

But in recent weeks it has been claimed that the pair are dealing with marriage woes amid their decision to unfollow each other on social media.

In a video posted on 22 October, Jeff can be seen without his ring on although several days later in another video for Vanarama, the sponsor for the National League, he had the ring firmly back on his finger.

On Instagram he has not shared any pictures of Kate since August, although he has been spotted wearing his ring in all the published snaps on the social media site.

The pair married in Portugal last year surrounded by their closest friends and family including the reality star’s two sons, Freddy and Bobby.

Jeff welcomed the pair with the late Jade Goody.

However, just a year into his marriage with Kate marriage, his rep has confirmed they have had ‘some difficulties’ in their relationship although insisted that there is ‘no split’.

The pair haven’t shared any photos of one another on social media since August and when the two unfollowed one another chatter reached fever pitch.

‘There is categorically no split between Jeff and Kate. We’re slightly bewildered how the story has come about,’ Jeff’s rep said.

‘However, they have had some difficulties but they are doing their utmost to work through them together and will continue to do so in private.’

Kate and Jeff wed in 2018 but are said to be having trouble adjusting to married life (Picture: Getty Images)

Jeff and Kate announced their engagement in October 2017, with the TV star gaining the all-important approval of his sons, Bobby, 16, and Freddie, 15.

The pair then recently celebrated their first wedding anniversary, after their 2018 nuptials and the dad-of-two thanked the PR expert for ‘bringing stability’ to his life.

‘I’m so happy to marry Kate, who has brought so much stability to my life,’ he explained to Hello! Magazine.

‘This isn’t just any wedding, this is a really special one. It doesn’t just represent Kate and I putting rings on each other’s fingers.

‘It represents the fact that we won at something really tricky. We won at becoming a family.’
